languages.text: "От скверномыслия, Ваш высокобродие! Несчастливые у нас времена пошли, землю трясет, все время что-то взрывается. Народ забоялся, совсем о долге забыл. Вот и появились эти, помилуй Император, проповедники... Подстрекательства начали! Уж мы их расстреливали, а их только больше становилось".

traits.locale_text: "Ума не приложу! Жили мы нормально, не голодали, не мерли. Ксеносы и пираты нас не тиранили, губернатор у нас достойный. Чего людям не хватало? Еще они говорят что-то не то про восход, не то про зарю — но что именно, не знаю."

languages.text: "Ill thoughts, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We've fallen on hard times, the ground keeps shaking, things keep exploding. The people are scared, they've forgotten all about their duty. And that's when those, Emperor forgive me, 'preachers' came... They started riling everyone up! Sure enough, we shot a few, but they just kept coming, more and more of them."
languages.original_text: "От скверномыслия, Ваш высокобродие! Несчастливые у нас времена пошли, землю трясет, все время что-то взрывается. Народ забоялся, совсем о долге забыл. Вот и появились эти, помилуй Император, проповедники... Подстрекательства начали! Уж мы их расстреливали, а их только больше становилось".

traits.locale_text: "Ill thoughts, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We've fallen on some unfortunate days, the ground keeps shaking, things keep exploding. The people are scared, they've forgotten all about their duty. And that's when those, Emperor forgive me, 'preachers' came... They started riling everyone up! Sure enough, we shot a few, but they just kept coming, more and more of them."

"Ill thoughts, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We've fallen on some unfortunate days, the ground keeps shaking, things keep exploding. The people are scared, they've forgotten all about their duty. And that's when those, Emperor forgive me, 'preachers' came... They started riling everyone up! Sure enough, we shot a few, but they just kept coming, more and more of them."

And that's when those, Emperor forgive me, 'preachers' came... They started riling everyone up! Sure enough, we shot a few, but they just kept coming, more and more of them."

And that's when those, Emperor forgive me, 'preachers' came... They started riling everyone up! Sure enough, we shot a few, but they just kept coming, more and more of them."

languages.text: "Böse Gedanken, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Wir erleben schwere Zeiten, der Boden bebt unaufhörlich, ständig gibt es irgendwo Explosionen. Die Leute haben Angst, sie haben ihre Pflicht völlig vergessen. Und da kamen diese, der Imperator möge mir verzeihen, 'Prediger' ... Sie haben alle aufgestachelt! Gewiss, wir haben einige davon erschossen, aber es kamen einfach immer mehr."
languages.original_text: "Ill thoughts, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We've fallen on hard times, the ground keeps shaking, things keep exploding. The people are scared, they've forgotten all about their duty. And that's when those, Emperor forgive me, 'preachers' came... They started riling everyone up! Sure enough, we shot a few, but they just kept coming, more and more of them."

traits.locale_text: "Böse Gedanken, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Wir erleben schwere Zeiten, der Boden bebt unaufhörlich, ständig gibt es irgendwo Explosionen. Die Leute haben Angst, sie haben ihre Pflicht völlig vergessen. Und da kamen diese, der Imperator möge mir verzeihen, 'Prediger' ... Sie haben alle aufgestachelt! Gewiss, wir haben einige davon erschossen, aber es kamen einfach immer mehr."

languages.text: « Bien des maux, {mf|monsieur|madame} ! Les temps sont durs... Le sol n'arrête pas de trembler et ça pète de tous les côtés. Les gens ont peur, au point d'en avoir oublié leurs devoirs. Et c'est le moment qu'ont choisi ces - pardonnez-moi l'expression - "prêcheurs" pour venir ici foutre le bordel. Alors oui, on en a buté quelques-uns, mais ils continuaient à venir, il y en avait de plus en plus. »
languages.original_text: "Ill thoughts, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We've fallen on hard times, the ground keeps shaking, things keep exploding. The people are scared, they've forgotten all about their duty. And that's when those, Emperor forgive me, 'preachers' came... They started riling everyone up! Sure enough, we shot a few, but they just kept coming, more and more of them."

traits.locale_text: « Bien des maux, {mf|monsieur|madame} ! Les temps sont durs... Le sol n'arrête pas de trembler et ça pète de tous les côtés. Les gens ont peur, au point d'en avoir oublié leurs devoirs. Et c'est le moment qu'ont choisi ces - pardonnez-moi l'expression - "prêcheurs" pour venir ici foutre le bordel. Alors oui, on en a buté quelques-uns, mais ils continuaient à venir, il y en avait de plus en plus. »

languages.text: “就是某些坏念头引起的，长官！当时的情况很可怕，地面一直在摇晃，一直有东西爆炸。所有人都吓坏了，吓得把职责都抛在了脑后。就在那时，愿帝皇原谅我说的话……那些‘布道士’来了……他们开始煽动遇到的每个人！当然，我们枪毙了几个布道士，但他们源源不断地涌过来，越来越多。”
languages.original_text: "Ill thoughts, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We've fallen on hard times, the ground keeps shaking, things keep exploding. The people are scared, they've forgotten all about their duty. And that's when those, Emperor forgive me, 'preachers' came... They started riling everyone up! Sure enough, we shot a few, but they just kept coming, more and more of them."

traits.locale_text: “就是某些坏念头引起的，长官！当时的情况很可怕，地面一直在摇晃，一直有东西爆炸。所有人都吓坏了，吓得把职责都抛在了脑后。就在那时，愿帝皇原谅我说的话……那些‘布道士’来了……他们开始煽动遇到的每个人！当然，我们枪毙了几个布道士，但他们源源不断地涌过来，越来越多。”

languages.text: 「悪い考えです！我々は窮地に立たされています。足元は揺れ続け、あちこちで爆発が起きています。人々は怯え、義務をすっかり忘れてしまった。その時…皇帝よ、お許しください。『プリーチャー』たちがやってきて…皆を煽り立て始めました！もちろん、何人かは撃ち殺したのですが、奴らがどんどん押し寄せてきて…」
languages.original_text: "Ill thoughts, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We've fallen on hard times, the ground keeps shaking, things keep exploding. The people are scared, they've forgotten all about their duty. And that's when those, Emperor forgive me, 'preachers' came... They started riling everyone up! Sure enough, we shot a few, but they just kept coming, more and more of them."

traits.locale_text: 「悪い考えです！我々は窮地に立たされています。足元は揺れ続け、物が爆発し続ける。人々は怯え、義務をすっかり忘れてしまった。その時…皇帝よ、お許しください。『プリーチャー』たちがやってきて…みんな激怒しました！もちろん、何人かは撃ち殺したのでうすが、奴らがどんどん押し寄せてきて…」

languages.text: «¡Malos pensamientos! Vivimos tiempos difíciles, el suelo sigue temblando, las cosas siguen explotando. La gente tiene miedo, se ha olvidado de su deber. Y fue entonces cuando esos, que el Emperador me perdone, "predicadores" vinieron... ¡Empezaron a alborotar a todo el mundo! Efectivamente, acabamos con unos cuantos, pero seguían llegando, más y más».
languages.original_text: "Ill thoughts, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We've fallen on hard times, the ground keeps shaking, things keep exploding. The people are scared, they've forgotten all about their duty. And that's when those, Emperor forgive me, 'preachers' came... They started riling everyone up! Sure enough, we shot a few, but they just kept coming, more and more of them."

traits.locale_text: «¡Malos pensamientos! Vivimos tiempos difíciles, el suelo sigue temblando, las cosas siguen explotando. La gente tiene miedo, se ha olvidado de su deber. Y fue entonces cuando esos, que el Emperador me perdone, "predicadores" vinieron... ¡Empezaron a alborotar a todo el mundo! Efectivamente, acabamos con unos cuantos, pero seguían llegando, más y más».

languages.text: "Fesatlık efendim! Zor günler geçiriyoruz. Yer sallanıyor, patlamalar devam ediyor. İnsanlar korkuyor, vazifelerini tamamen unuttular. Tam o sırada, İmparator affetsin ama şu 'vaizler' peydahlandı. İnsanları zıvanadan çıkarmaya başladılar! Birkaçını vurduk tabii ama pisliklerin ardı arkası kesilmedi."
languages.original_text: "Ill thoughts, {mf|sir|ma'am}! We've fallen on hard times, the ground keeps shaking, things keep exploding. The people are scared, they've forgotten all about their duty. And that's when those, Emperor forgive me, 'preachers' came... They started riling everyone up! Sure enough, we shot a few, but they just kept coming, more and more of them."

traits.locale_text: "Fesatlık efendim! Zor günler geçiriyoruz. Yer sallanıyor, patlamalar devam ediyor. İnsanlar korkuyor, vazifelerini tamamen unuttular. Tam o sırada, İmparator affetsin ama şu 'vaizler' peydahlandı. İnsanları zıvanadan çıkarmaya başladılar! Birkaçını vurduk tabii ama pisliklerin ardı arkası kesilmedi."
